intro: Saurauia micrantha, commonly known as the small-flowered saurauia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Ericaceae family and is typically found in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant is characterized by its small, white or pale pink flowers and evergreen foliage. It thrives in shaded, moist environments and is often found in forest undergrowth. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural studies.
